command.description: Enter a bash command. Do not hardcode secret values in the command, as it is not secured
command.title: Bash command to run

continue_if_failed.description: If the command fails, continue MegaLinter process
continue_if_failed.title: Continue if failed

cwd.description: Select if the command will be run at the root of MegaLinter execution (root) or in the workspace folder where code is checked out (workspace)
cwd.title: Folder where to run the command

output_variables.description: ENV variables to get from output after running the commands, and store in MegaLinter ENV context, so they can be reused by other custom command and linters.
output_variables.title: Output ENV variables

secured_env.description: Apply filtering of secured env variables before calling the command (default true). Be careful if you disable it, it will expose all env variables to the command, including secret ones.
secured_env.title: Secured ENV variables

tag.description: Select 'Before Plugins' if you need the command to be run before the MegaLinter plugins are initialized (rarely needed)
tag.title: Execution order tag

venv.description: (Optional) Name of the Python virtual environment to use to run the command. Example: flake8 if you want to install a flake8 plugin.
venv.title: Python Virtual Env
